mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON( LOGIN_ID, LESSON_DATE, LESSON_ID, LESSON_DIV, MAX_RESERVE_COUNT, TITLE, LESSON_CLASS, LESSON_LEVEL) VALUES ( #{loginId}, -- 토큰이 갖고있는 회원 ID TO_CHAR(#{lessonDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), -- 강습날짜 선택 후 'L' || LPAD(LESSON_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, 0), --시퀀스 처리 #{lessonDiv}, -- 오전, 오후, 야간 중 입력받아서 #{maxReserveCount}, -- 최대인원 설정하기 #{title}, -- 강습명 #{lessonClass}, -- 스키 or 보드 #{lessonLevel} -- 난이도 )
mapper.update: UPDATE LESSON SET TITLE = #{title}, LESSON_CLASS = #{lessonClass}, LESSON_LEVEL = #{lessonLevel}, LESSON_DATE = TO_CHAR(#{lessonDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), LESSON_DIV = #{lessonDiv}, MAX_RESERVE_COUNT = #{maxReserveCount} WHERE LESSON_ID = #{lessonId}
UPDATE LESSON SET DEL_YN = 'Y', DEL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE LESSON_ID = #{lessonId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT L.LESSON_ID, L.LOGIN_ID, T.NAME, L.TITLE, L.LESSON_CLASS, L.LESSON_LEVEL, L.LESSON_DATE, S.RESORT_NAME, L.RESERVE_COUNT, L.MAX_RESERVE_COUNT, D.DIV, S.STAT FROM LESSON L INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON L.LOGIN_ID = T.ID INNER JOIN SKI_RESORT S ON T.RESORT_ID = S.RESORT_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_VALUE AS DIV FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE NO = '004') D ON L.LESSON_DIV = D.CODE INNER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_VALUE AS STAT FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE NO = '003') S ON L.LESSON_STAT = S.CODE WHERE L.LESSON_STAT = 'LS01' -- 강습상태가 신청가능이면

-- 강습 불가능할 때 화면에 띄워줄게 아니라면 신청 가능할 때 강습가능이라는 멘트를 빼는게 맞지않나??? SELECT L.LESSON_ID, L.LOGIN_ID, T.NAME, L.TITLE, L.LESSON_CLASS, L.LESSON_LEVEL, L.LESSON_DATE, S.RESORT_NAME, L.RESERVE_COUNT, L.MAX_RESERVE_COUNT, D.DIV, S.STAT FROM LESSON L INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON L.LOGIN_ID = T.ID INNER JOIN SKI_RESORT S ON T.RESORT_ID = S.RESORT_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_VALUE AS DIV FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE NO = '004') D ON L.LESSON_DIV = D.CODE INNER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_VALUE AS STAT FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE NO = '003') S ON L.LESSON_STAT = S.CODE WHERE L.LESSON_STAT = 'LS01' -- 강습상태가 신청가능이면 AND TO_CHAR(L.LESSON_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{lessonDate}
